idea-plugin.name: CurNotesMDs
idea-plugin.description:
Save Notes that belong to the project

You can save notes that belong to the project. They will be saved in the .idea-folder.

So if you don't track your .idea-folder with git, the notes are also not tracked.

So you can call it "private notes".

This plugin needs MarkdownSupport
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Fileformat changed form *.txt to *.md If you have made some notes with Version 1.0 you have to copy the content from the .idea/.curnotes.txt into the new curtnost.md - File.
  1. Open .idea/curnotes.txt in your ide ore anny editor
  2. copy all content you need to clipboard
  3. create new curnotes (Tools => curNotes) in your IDE
  4. create new curnotes (Tools => curNotes) in your IDE
  5. Paste content
Now you can delete the .idea/.curnotes.txt - file
